title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, the guys talk about Patrick Beverley's introductory press conference with the Lakers. Should he be more aware of his role in LA? Eli Manning calls in to  share stories about his Manningcast with Peyton. And Dean Blandino shares a new rule the NFL implemented that no one's talking about.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
